page.text: RSV LYSSA RESEARCH TERMINAL 01 Welcome USER: Dr. Miller PLEASE REMBER TO LOGG OFF AFTER EVERY SESSION TO PREVENT ACCOUNT ABUSE

*static* "ahem, Dr. Emanuel Miller genetic engineering Supervision research log 43... Today, we've received another remarkable specimen. Its structure is comparable to basic amoeba but with a far more defined carapace. Like most of the prior specimen. This one is completely feral. Scans indicated it certainly never was intelligent. I see potential in this one, I think this one will be my favorite."

Dr. Emanuel Miller, log 45. This is astounding! This amoeba is nothing we've ever Seen before. It appears perfectly able to mimic simple objects by changing its shape. Yet it is also able to manipulate its surface density to switch from semi-fluid to rock solid. Ethology division has run test on it and we can manipulate its neural core to let it perform simple tasks. Arms officer Richard has suggested to weaponize its potential, while one C2 supervisor suggested to turn it into a shape shifting sextoy. I think I have my own idea.

Miller, log 46. I have erased my previous logs, nothing should distract me from this subject. We have genetically uplifted its intelligence to make it more receptive for commands. It worked better as we ever expected, the amoeba has developed the ability to perform complex tasks. I have also discovered something spectacular, thanks to my assistant Ryan. *you can clearly hear muffled screams in the background as Miller pauses* Unlike normal amoeba, this one is able to ingest prey and hold it captive until it requires the nutrition. It's also able to bypass the containment lock and free itself, we need to give it some defined shape to prevent this from happening again.

Miller here, we held a vote in the cantina about the defined shape of the amoeba, Some suggested to turn it into a grumpy blob version of Admiral Lewins and while I must agree, that I found this idea amusing, I'm glad this one won the poll. G2 is calling it goo dragon, It's almost perfect. I will have to run some tests on the clones. It seems to enjoy eating everything edible it can find, I'll have fix this later, also might reduce the size.

You enter the password and access the emergency live broadcast. You can see the white, terror fueled, scaly face of a very humanoid looking person, wearing glasses while staring into the terminal camera, sweat is running down his cheeks as he speaks. "This is Dr. Miller *ugh* something is attacking the ship, readings show half of the ship is damaged, reformers are offline, if they get me, I'm done for." An audible crash fills the room as the sound of warning sirens springs into live.

You see Dr. Miller turn around in panik, as something approaches him. "NO NONONO STAY PUT YOU STUPID CREATURE!". You can see an orange, gooey creature leap from the side as Miller gets tackled to the ground. "NO YOU CAN'T DO THIS I'VE CREATED YOU IM YOUR MMPPFF"" You watch the creature move in front of the camera, head down and clearly busy with the scientist. You can't see every detail since most of the creature is blocking the view. But you notice a bulge wandering the creatures' neck and descending into its belly, clearly filling it out in the process. Suddenly the creature arches up, staring straight into the camera. You see the former scientist feet vanish into its gullet, as the goo dragon approaches the terminal... The next 2 minutes of the recording, mainly consists of footage of the goo dragon gingerly licking the camera, until the screen goes dark.
